mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QnABoard ( category, title, content , member_userId, member_nickName ) VALUES (#{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{nickName} );
mapper.select: SELECT q.qnaId, q.category, q.title, q.content, q.status, m.userId, m.nickName FROM QnABoard q LEFT JOIN member m ON q.member_userId = m.userId WHERE m.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY qnaId DESC
